org.pac4j.oauth.client

Class BaseOAuthClient<U extends OAuth20Profile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableWebObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<C,U>
        • org.pac4j.core.client.IndirectClient<OAuthCredentials,U>
          • org.pac4j.oauth.client.BaseOAuthClient<U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Client<OAuthCredentials,U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseOAuth10Client, BaseOAuth20Client

    public abstract class BaseOAuthClient<U extends OAuth20Profile>
extends IndirectClient<OAuthCredentials,U>
    This class is a base implementation for an OAuth protocol client based on the Scribe library. It should work for all OAuth clients. In subclasses, some methods are to be implemented / customized for specific needs depending on the client.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu

      • sendRequestForData

        public String sendRequestForData(OAuth10Profile profile,
                                 String dataUrl)
        Make a request to the OAuth provider to access a protected resource. The profile should contain a valid access token (and secret if needed).
        Parameters:
        profile - user profile
        dataUrl - url of the data
        Returns:
        the body of the requested resource
